title: Merge LMS Course Sections
description: A professor is teaching multiple sections of the same course and wants to merge them into a single LMS shell to simplify content management.

tasks.description: Identify the faculty member and the course sections to be merged.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the professor teaches sections 001, 002, and 003 of 'HIST101'.

tasks.description: Explain the implications of merging, such as how the gradebook will appear.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent clearly communicates the features of a merged course shell.

tasks.description: Process the course merge request in the LMS admin tools.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully merges the sections into a single LMS course.
